thread.section_title: Coolicool 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Coolicool 的点评意见 | coolicool.com | 18 2
thread.title: Matt Smith
thread.title_full: Coolicool 的点评人 Matt Smith

author: Matt Smith
title: Matt Smith
text:
Very happy indeed with my recent purchase from Coolicool. It was my first time using them and I was unsure what to expect. I needn't have worried. I bought an item sent from Hong Kong, which arrived quickly (ZTE Z7 Max) with the latest official ROM installed.
After making payment I was kept well informed of the status of the order, then given tracking info for the parcel. All in all I highly recommend this store. They appear to have great prices and the service is lacking nothing. I should add I wasn't paid for this review, nor am I a member of the Illuminati, nor any similar international conspiracy!
